description: Known vLLM tool-call parser choices and their typical output style. Validate empirically per model.

parsers.name: hermes
parsers.notes: Worked for Qwen/Qwen2.5-1.5B-Instruct in this repo when started with --enable-auto-tool-choice.

parsers.name: openai
parsers.notes: May require token-id support; can error for some models/runtimes.

parsers.name: pythonic
parsers.notes: May emit <tool_call> XML-ish tags in content for some models (non-OpenAI tool_calls).

parsers.name: llama3_json
parsers.notes: For Llama3-style JSON tool calling; validate.
